translation.english: The credentials used are not valid
translation.spanish: Las credenciales que ingresó son incorrectas

translation.english: The database server is not available
translation.spanish: El servidor de la base de datos no esta disponible

translation.english: Please modify the incorrect fields
translation.spanish: Por favor corrija los campos incorrectos

translation.english: The report has been sent succesfully
translation.spanish: El reporte ha sido enviado con éxito

translation.english: ERROR!: The message could not be sent
translation.spanish: ¡ERROR!: No se pudo enviar el mensaje

translation.english: Only images are allowed as attached files
translation.spanish: Sólo se permite adjuntar imágenes

translation.english: Invalid file format
translation.spanish: Formato de archivo no válido

translation.english: New logo uploaded
translation.spanish: Nuevo logo actualizado

translation.english: The password is not valid
translation.spanish: La contraseña ingresada no es válida

translation.english: Please fill all fields
translation.spanish: Por favor llene todos los campos

translation.english: The password and verification don't match
translation.spanish: La contraseña y la verificación no coinciden

translation.english: Your password has been succesfully changed
translation.spanish: Su contraseña ha sido modificada exitosamente

translation.english: Your email has been succesfully changed
translation.spanish: Su correo electrónico ha sido modificado exitosamente

translation.english: Your username has been succesfully changed
translation.spanish: Su nombre de usuario ha sido modificado exitosamente

translation.english: The employees have been reassigned
translation.spanish: Los empleados han sido reasignados

translation.english: The employee has been assigned a new supervisor
translation.spanish: El empleado ha sido asignado a un nuevo supervisor

translation.english: There was an error during the reassignment, retry
translation.spanish: Hubo un error durante la reasignación, intente nuevamente

translation.english: Attention! The user must be assigned a supervisor to complete this action
translation.spanish: ¡Atención! Se debe asignar un supervisor al usuario para completar el cambio de rol

translation.english: You must select different supervisors reassign an employee
translation.spanish: Debe escoger supervisores distintos para reasignar empleados

translation.english: You must assign a supervisor to the employee
translation.spanish: Debe asignar un supervisor al empleado

translation.english: The username is already in use
translation.spanish: El nombre de usuario ya se encuentra registrado

translation.english: The email is already in use
translation.spanish: El correo electronico ya se encuentra registrado

translation.english: The employee ID is already in use
translation.spanish: El numero de empleado ya se encuentra registrado

translation.english: Zone name already in use
translation.spanish: El nombre de zona ya se encuentra en uso

translation.english: Zone name can't be empty
translation.spanish: El nombre de la zona no puede encontrarse vacío

translation.english: Zone name can't be empty
translation.spanish: El nombre de la zona no puede encontrarse vacío

translation.english: Please correct the duplicate fields
translation.spanish: Modifique los campos que ya se encuentran registrados

translation.english: User registered succesfully
translation.spanish: El usuario se ha registrado con éxito

translation.english: Zone registered successfully
translation.spanish: La zona se ha registrado con éxito

translation.english: Workplace area registered succesfully
translation.spanish: Área de trabajo agregada con éxito

translation.english: Your session was already active
translation.spanish: La sesión ya está iniciada

translation.english: You must provide an item name and type
translation.spanish: Debe ingresar un nombre y tipo para el objeto

translation.english: The field must have a minimal length of
translation.spanish: El campo debe tener una longitud mínima de

translation.english: The item was succesfully added
translation.spanish: El elemento se añadió correctamente

translation.english: The item was charged
translation.spanish: El elemento fue dado de alta

translation.english: The item was discharged
translation.spanish: El elemento fue dado de baja

translation.english: The log has been approved
translation.spanish: La bitácora ha sido aprobada

translation.english: The log has been sent to revision
translation.spanish: La bitácora ha sido enviada a revisión

translation.english: new pending authorizations
translation.spanish: nuevas autorizaciones pendientes

translation.english: The user zone has been changed to
translation.spanish: La zona del usuario ha sido cambiada a

translation.english: A supervisor can't change its zone while it has employees assigned
translation.spanish: El supervisor no puede cambiar su zona mientras tenga empleados asignados

translation.english: A supervisor can't change its role while it has employees assigned
translation.spanish: El supervisor no puede cambiar su role mientras tenga empleados asignados

translation.english: There was an error; your action was not completed
translation.spanish: Hubo un error; no se pudo completar la acción

translation.english: Privileges updated
translation.spanish: Permisos actualizados

translation.english: You haven't changed the user privileges
translation.spanish: No ha modificado los privilegios del usuario

translation.english: User role has been modified to
translation.spanish: El rol del usuario ha sido cambiado a

translation.english: The area {{value}} has been added
translation.spanish: El área {{value}} fue añadida

translation.english: Program footers updated
translation.spanish: Pies de página actualizados

translation.english: Zone data updated
translation.spanish: Información de zona actualizada

translation.english: Text must be no longer than {{value}} characters
translation.spanish: El texto no debe superar los {{value}} caracteres

translation.english: Text must be at least {{value}} characters long
translation.spanish: El texto debe tener al menos {{value}} caracteres

translation.english: You must enter a text value
translation.spanish: Debe introducir un valor en el campo de texto

translation.english: The number must be lower than {{value}}
translation.spanish: El número debe ser menor a {{value}}

translation.english: The number must be higher than {{value}}
translation.spanish: El número debe ser mayor a {{value}}

translation.english: The value must be a number
translation.spanish: El valor del campo debe ser numérico

translation.english: You must select a valid option
translation.spanish: Debe seleccionar una opción válida

translation.english: You must select one option
translation.spanish: Debe marcar una opción

translation.english: You must mark an item as either Acceptable or Unacceptable
translation.spanish: Debe marcar el objeto como Aceptable o No Aceptable

translation.english: You must select a corrective action other than None
translation.spanish: Debe seleccionar una acción correctiva diferente a None (ninguno)

translation.english: The comment for an item must not exceed {{value}} characters
translation.spanish: El comentario de un objeto no debe exceder {{value}} caracteres

translation.english: The notes for an area must not exceed {{value}} characters
translation.spanish: Las notas de área no deben exceder {{value}} caracteres

translation.english: The name of the person performing sanitation must not exceed {{value}} characters
translation.spanish: El nombre de la persona a cargo de la sanitización no debe exceder {{value}} caracteres

translation.english: The notes of the report must not exceed {{value}} characters
translation.spanish: Las notas del reporte no deben exceder {{value}} caracteres

translation.english: The URL of the Picasa Album must not exceed {{value}} characters
translation.spanish: El URL del album de Picasa no debe exceder {{value}} caracteres

translation.english: Failed to add new area; the name is already taken
translation.spanish: Error al añadir area; el nombre del área se encuentra repetido

translation.english: The test result must be a number
translation.spanish: El resultado de la prueba debe ser un número

translation.english: You must either select a scale to Pass or Fail
translation.spanish: El resultado de la prueba debe marcarse como Pasó o Falló

translation.english: You must enter a value for the ice point method test
translation.spanish: Debe ingresar un valor para la prueba del método del punto de hielo

translation.english: You must indicate if the thermometer was calibrated or not
translation.spanish: Debe indicar si el termómetro fue calibrado o no

translation.english: You must mark an item as either Approved or Unapproved
translation.spanish: Debe marcar el objeto como Aprobado o No Aprobado

translation.english: You must enter a name for the area tested
translation.spanish: Debe indicar el nombre del area probada

translation.english: The area's name must not exceed {{value}} characters
translation.spanish: El nombre del area no debe exceder {{value}} caracteres

translation.english: You must mark an item as either Pass or Fail
translation.spanish: Debe marcar el objeto como Pasó o Falló

translation.english: You must enter the washing water temperature
translation.spanish: Debe indicar la temperatura del agua para lavado

translation.english: You must enter the packing temperature
translation.spanish: Debe indicar la temperatura de empacado

translation.english: You must indicate if the weight was correct
translation.spanish: Debe indicar si el peso fue correcto

translation.english: You must indicate if the product was correctly labeled
translation.spanish: Debe indicar si el producto fue etiquetado adecuadamente

translation.english: You must indicate if the product is traceable
translation.spanish: Debe indicar la trazabilidad del producto

translation.english: You must enter the name of the supplier (at least 2 characters)
translation.spanish: Debe ingresar el nombre del proveedor (al menos 2 caracteres)

translation.english: You must enter the name of the product (at least 2 characters)
translation.spanish: Debe ingresar el nombre del producto (al menos 2 caracteres)

translation.english: You must enter the name of the cliente (at least 2 characters)
translation.spanish: Debe ingresar el nombre del cliente (al menos 2 caracteres)
